channel.title: Questing &slayer
channel.description:
Hey, Two things, I just thought I'd post it both in one thread.
First of all, I want storm of arma pretty bad so I can get the Tokhar cape(or whatever its called) without getting my defence up. So if anyone wants to do some questing if I've not done the quest and its not a depressing quest I'll do it with you:)?
Also, what's a fairly fast not overly expensive way of getting slayer up pretty fast? I've been doing slayer for a long time on this account and I'm only 100k of 83 Slayer and I want 95 slay for effigy hunting and Ice Stryke tasks(looks like awesome lootage and you hit crazy high;o). Any tips? I like getting decent loot in my tasks as I don't try to make gp and I just generally accumulate it from random things so slayer with no reward doesn't sound appealing for the way I play Rs.

item.title: Questing &slayer
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:7, topic:436678”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=539394.msg3947864#msg3947864 date=1332032175]

I thought its nerfed as in the more effigy’s you have the less you get? Ah sweet, gp ph estimate?

iirc you can only have 3 max at any time lol

Its 5, I don’t mind banking though. I don’t want to extreme effigy hunt, just when I’m bored go kill a few for a lil while get an effigy open it go sleep w.e. I do a lot of Rs where I’ll just sit around g.e being bored.
[/quote]

Let’s say I had 13 in my bank, then they did that update. What happened to them? Will I get them back as I use them?[/quote]

you still keep them, you just can’t get more

Read full topic

item.title: Questing &slayer
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:436678”]kuradel master
-block all long tasks such as dragons/lrc monsters[/quote]
But me likes drag tasks, smexi gps and lrc is epic melee xps >.<. This is probably why its taking me forever;p.

Phaze One:

Just a hint effigy hunting is practically dead so you won’t have much luck at ganodermics but they are still a great source of money so i highly recommend it

I thought its nerfed as in the more effigy’s you have the less you get? Ah sweet, gp ph estimate?

Read full topic
